title: How much money did Czechoslovakia lose in World War II? - Quora

response.answer_text: It ceased to exist. The country was created by the allies after World War 1. Many of the people thrown together did not get along. They felt oppressed by the Czechs. The German speakers wanted to be part of Germany, and their schools were moving towards lessons in the Czech language only. The Slovakians wanted independence. The Hungarians and Poles wanted to be returned to Hungary and Poland in 1938. Had the allies known more about the politics of Eastern Europe it would never have been created. Woodrow Wilson felt he was misled by Benes the Czech leader.
